translation.name: Siegfried Alimi
translation.role: Tech Lead | Application Architect | Senior Full Stack Dev
translation.aboutDesc: I am a computing engineer leaving in Paris, France. I have 19+ years of experience in web application development and both front-end and back-end development skills. I have been working for 10 years as Tech Lead with a 7 people dev team in an insurance company.

experience.projectDesc: Development and migration of Cloud Native applications on the SMA Private Cloud

responsabilitiesDesc.responsabilityName: Implementation of Cloud Native application using Angular 16 with standalone components and PrimeNG on the Front-end and Java 17 / Spring Boot 3.2 on the Back-end. New applications (attestation management tool and a pricing portal) and migrations of existing applications (management of external collaborators, assistance with mail creation)
Compliance with Microservice (12 Factors) and DDD principles
REST API design for microservices developed by other IT teams
Internationalization of an application with Angular Transloco and ChatGPT for translation into Spanish and English
Preparation and animation of onBoarding Teams meetings for new Cloud applications with the various IT department stakeholders (Architects, Operators, DBA).
Supervision of developers working on the new architecture (training, support, code review, refactoring assistance)

experience.technicalEnvironmentDesc: MicroService Java 17 / SpringBoot 3.2, Gradle 8, REST, Angular 16, GIT, GitLab, SonarQube, PrimeNG, JWT, Swagger, Docker, Kubernetes, VSCode, IntelliJ, Artifactory, DB2 v11, Windows 10

experience.projectDesc: Support and development of the SMABTP business application, "Reglements", for Claims Processing. Adding Motor Fleet Claims Management feature. Development of a batch to read Vehicle Experts reports from Darva remote platform and automatically pay customers.

responsabilitiesDesc.responsabilityName: Designed of a new batch architecture with Java 8 and Spring Boot using TDD and DDD best practices. This new batch architecture serves as a model to 3 developers to develop 3 new batchs for recourse processing.

experience.technicalEnvironmentDesc: Java 8, Spring Boot 2, REST, Spring Data JPA, MAVEN, GIT, IntelliJ, SWAGGER, DB2 v10, JAXB 2, JMS, Artifactory, Scrum, Windows 10

experience.projectDesc: Support and development of the SMABTP business application, "Reglements", for Claims Processing. Adding Motor Fleet Claims Management feature. Init project.

responsabilitiesDesc.responsabilityName: Designed and developped new feature to require vehicle experts inspections using Java, Spring and AngularJS.
Coach and support the dev team.

experience.technicalEnvironmentDesc: Java 6, Spring MVC 3, Spring 3, AngularJS 1.6, NPM, GRUNT, Bower, Bootstrap, REST, JPA/Hibernate, MAVEN, JBoss 6, DB2 v9, GIT, Jenkins, Sonar, ECLIPSE, JMS, Artifactory, Scrum, Windows 10

education.specialization: Computer Science and networking Engineer diploma

education.degree: Preparatory classes : two-year undergraduate intensive course in mathematics and physics

translation.interestsDesc: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my free time doing Sport. I play soccer and commute with my longboard. I also do snowboarding in the winter. When forced indoors, I like to play guitare and ukulele, watch movies and follow several Netflix TV shows. I am passionate about web development, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements. I attend Devoxx Conference every year.
translation.address: 14 rue des Blancs Murs 94400 Vitry-sur-Seine, France
